definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level

sentences.english: When I just arrived, buildings were two-floor ones with yards.
sentences.chinese: 我刚到的时候这里的建筑都是两层楼，带有院子的。

sentences.english: The larger ones, three or four stories high, have wooden stairs connecting the floors.
sentences.chinese: 稍大一些的土楼有三或四层楼高，有木制的楼梯连接。

sentences.english: Here was a big round 2-floor architecture in the middle of the palace.
sentences.chinese: 这是宫殿中央的一个巨大两层楼的圆形建筑。

sentences.english: Three horizontal bands of louvers shade each of the three storeys independently.
sentences.chinese: 三组水平的百叶窗分别遮挡三层楼的每一层。

sentences.english: Patton is a K-5 building with 425 students.
sentences.chinese: 帕顿是所拥有425名学生的一层楼的学校。

sentences.english: How many floors does that skyscraper have?
sentences.chinese: 那栋摩天大楼有几多层楼？

sentences.english: It consists of multiple passages and empty rooms.
sentences.chinese: 这层楼面上有多条过道和多个空房间。

sentences.english: The buildings were made of stone and wood and were only a few stories tall.
sentences.chinese: 房子大多由石头和木材建造而成，只有几层楼的高度。

sentences.english: Each of the machines is worth several million dollars and stands as tall as a two-story house.
sentences.chinese: 每个模具都值几百万美元，有两层楼那么高。

sentences.english: How long does it take to reach the ground from 110 stories up?
sentences.chinese: 从110层楼到地面，需要花多长时间？

sentences.english: This building is about three floors, plus the ground floor, making it four floors.
sentences.chinese: 这栋建筑大约三层楼高，加上地下室总共四层。

sentences.english: The house is two storeys high and is made of local stone.
sentences.chinese: 房子有两层楼高，并且是用当地的石头做成的。

sentences.english: It has been shifting since the first 3 portico stories were constructed on soft ground in the 12th century.
sentences.chinese: 12世纪时，它的前三层楼刚建起就已经开始倾斜。

sentences.english: Between the two floors there is empty space which is thesize of the whole floor.
sentences.chinese: 两层楼之间有一块相当于整层楼那么大的空余空间。

sentences.english: Inside all wholesale and some wholesale house has several floors.
sentences.chinese: 里边全是批发的，有些批发家还几层楼的。

sentences.english: The blaze was contained mostly to the fourth floor of the five-story building, the news agency said.
sentences.chinese: 大火烧了五层楼的四层楼，新闻媒体说。

definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
top floor/attic/loft/garret/penthouse/(flat) rooftop (often used as an outdoor living area etc)
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
top floor/the top of a building
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
